db:abstract.db:para: Streaming video on a graphics scene.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = app TARGET = videographicsitem
QT += multimedia multimediawidgets
HEADERS += videoplayer.h
SOURCES += main.cpp \ videoplayer.cpp
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/multimediawidgets/videographicsitem INSTALLS += target
QT+=widgets
